```{r setup,include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE, cache=TRUE)
```

```{r load-packages}
library(leaflet)
library(magrittr)
library(DT)
```

```{r read-data} 
pizza <- jsonlite::fromJSON(here::here('data', 'FavoriteSpots.json')) %>% 
    tidyr::unnest()

pizza <- crosstalk::SharedData$new(pizza)
```

# First Page

## Left Column

### Table

```{r pizza-table}
datatable(pizza, rownames=FALSE, elementId='PizzaTable')
```

## Right Column

### Map

```{r pizza-map}
leaflet(data=pizza, elementId='PizzaMap') %>% 
    addTiles() %>% 
    addMarkers(
        lng = ~longitude,
        lat = ~latitude,
        popup = ~Name
    )
```
